00007 Integrate::Integrate()
00008 {
00009     SimulationParameters::initialiseIntegrate(m_IntegrateType,m_timestep);
00010 }
00011 
00012 void Integrate::integrateNext(Particle &io_fluidParticle)
00013 {
00014     /*---Calling chosed integration of the following-------------------------------------*/
00015     if (m_IntegrateType == "SEMI_IMPLICIT_EULER")
00016     {
00017         calculateSemiImplicitEuler(io_fluidParticle);
00018     }
00019     if (m_IntegrateType == "LEAPFROG")
00020     {
00021         calculateLeapfrog(io_fluidParticle);
00022     }
00023 }
00024 
00025 
00026 void Integrate::calculateSemiImplicitEuler(Particle &io_fluidParticle)
00027 {
00028     /*-----semi implicit euler from http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Semi-implicit_Euler----------------------------------------------*/
00029 
00030     io_fluidParticle.updateVelocity(io_fluidParticle.getCurrentVelocity() + (io_fluidParticle.getCurrentAcceleration() * m_timestep));
00031 
00032     io_fluidParticle.updatePosition(io_fluidParticle.getCurrentPosition() + (io_fluidParticle.getCurrentVelocity() * m_timestep));
00033 }
00034 
00035 void Integrate::calculateLeapfrog(Particle &io_fluidParticle)
00036 {
00037     /*-----modified leapfrog from http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Leapfrog_Integrate-----------------------------------------------------------*/
00038 
00039     io_fluidParticle.updateVelocity(io_fluidParticle.getCurrentVelocity() + (((io_fluidParticle.getLastAcceleration() + io_fluidParticle.getCurrentAcceleration()) / 2.0) * m_timestep));
00040 
00041     io_fluidParticle.updatePosition(io_fluidParticle.getCurrentPosition() + (io_fluidParticle.getCurrentVelocity() * m_timestep) + ((io_fluidParticle.getLastAcceleration() / 2.0) * m_timestep * m_timestep));
00042 }
